original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
translated: The Chapter on the Faculties🔽The Numerical Series of the Conditions in Pairs

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)🔽12.13. Piṭṭhiduka, Hetuduka
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  piṭṭhiduka hetuduka
translated: The Pairs in Reverse Order🔽With root-cause as condition, a non-root-cause …

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na dassanena pahātabbam na hetu
translated: With non-causally-originated as condition, a causally-originated …🔽With causally-originated as condition, a non-causally-originated …

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanabhāvanāya🔽pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na bhāvanāya  pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhamma  paṭicca pe na na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya
translated: With causally-originated as condition, a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated …🔽With non-causally-originated as condition, a non-causally-originated …🔽With causally-originated and non-causally-originated as condition, a causally-originated …

original: pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ
analyzed: pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na hetu
translated: With causally-originated and non-causally-originated as condition, a non-causally-originated …🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta
translated: With root-cause as condition, five …🔽With non-concomitant as condition, five.

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With non-concomitant as condition, a non-concomitant …🔽With non-concomitant as condition, a concomitant …🔽With non-concomitant as condition, a concomitant and a non-concomitant …🔽With concomitant and non-concomitant as condition, a concomitant …🔽With concomitant and non-concomitant as condition, a non-concomitant …

original: Nasavitakkaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: na sa vitakkam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na avitakkam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: With concomitant and non-concomitant as condition, a concomitant and a non-concomitant …🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: nasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…🔽nasappītikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappītikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: na sa vicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na avicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe  na sappītikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na appītikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: a factor that is without thought and without root-cause … a factor that is without thought and with root-cause …🔽a factor that is without happiness and without root-cause … a factor that is without happiness and with root-cause …

original: napītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanapītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽…pe… nasukhasahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanasukhasahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na pīti sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca  pe na sukha sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na sukha sahagatam na hetum dhamma
translated: a factor that is not accompanied by happiness and without root-cause … a factor that is not accompanied by happiness and with root-cause …🔽a factor that is not accompanied by pleasure and without root-cause … a factor that is not accompanied by pleasure and with root-cause …

original: paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ
analyzed: paṭicca pe na aupekkhā sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na aupekkhā sahagata
translated: a factor that is not accompanied by equanimity and without root-cause … a factor that is not accompanied by equanimity and with root-cause …

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: a factor that is not a condition by way of root-cause condition … (abbreviated)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
translated: with root-cause: nine … with prenascence: six … with development: six … with non-disappearance: nine.

original: Nakāmāvacaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanakāmāvacaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kāmāvacaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na kāmāvacaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: a factor that is not of the sense-sphere and without root-cause … a factor that is not not of the sense-sphere and without root-cause …

original: …pe… narūpāvacaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanarūpāvacaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe na rūpāvacaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na rūpāvacaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: … a non-causally-originated fine-material-sphere … a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated fine-material-sphere … a non-causally-originated immaterial-sphere … a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated immaterial-sphere … a non-causally-originated neither-… nor-non-…

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava
translated: With respect to cause nine, with respect to object four, with respect to predominance five … with respect to support six … with respect to prenascence and to postnascence two … with respect to non-disappearance nine.

original: Naarūpāvacaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanaarūpāvacaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na arūpāvacaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na na arūpāvacaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
translated: With a non-causally-originated immaterial-sphere … a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated immaterial-sphere … With respect to cause five, with respect to object two … with respect to non-disappearance five.

original: Napariyāpannaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naapariyāpannaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Naniyyānikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyyānikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: na pariyāpannam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na a pariyāpannam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca  na niyyānikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyyānikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: With a non-causally-originated unincluded … a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated unincluded … With respect to cause five, with respect to object two … with respect to non-disappearance five.🔽With a non-causally-originated not-subject-to-retrogressing … a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated not-subject-to-retrogressing …

original: naniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na niyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a non-causally-originated subject-to-retrogressing … a causally-originated and a non-causally-originated subject-to-retrogressing …

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to nutriment, there is one … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.🔽With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.🔽With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.

original: Nasauttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sauttaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anuttaram na hetum dhammam paṭicca  / na saraṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.🔽With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.

original: Naaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ🔽nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ
analyzed: na araṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na hetum dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na hetu
translated: With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu ca naaraṇo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñca naaraṇaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na hetu ca na araṇaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā 🔽na saraṇam na hetuñca na araṇam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.🔽With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.🔽With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.🔽With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to the unspecific, there are five.

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro  na saraṇam nana hetum dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ nana hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to cause, there are five; with respect to object, there are two … With respect to nutriment, there is one … With respect to the unincluded, there are five. (In each case elaborate in detail.)🔽With respect to the unincluded and with respect to the various causes, there arises the unincluded and with respect to the various causes, a state of dhamma through a condition by way of cause.

original: Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam nana hetum dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ nana hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to the included and with respect to the various causes, there arises the included and with respect to the various causes, a state of dhamma through a condition by way of cause. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve sabbattha vitthāro
translated: With respect to cause, there are two … With respect to nutriment, there is one … With respect to the unincluded, there are two. (In each case elaborate in detail.)
